item.description:
Simple . Sexy . Super Hero . Horror - meet one and all in one night! Your Favorate music playing all night long - bhangra . bollywood . top40 . hiphop . international. Let's make it happen, come celebrate Halloween in your best costume!! See details and ticketting at www.GenerationDesi.com! Prizes for Best Costume!! Dress up in your favorate costume or come as yourself... Don't miss out on the fun, come be a part of the festivities! The choice is yours..dress up as catwoman, angel or a devil. Dress up as a Muni, Sheila or a Chikni Chameli! Bring out your personality! Come dress up as Iron man, Spiderman, Superman or count Dracula! Dress up Don, Pappu or Krissh-your choice!! With the best DJ's and the best venue..we will be dancing all night long! Doors open Friday at 9pm. Downstairs at Brighton Beer Garden! We have a separate entrance to the large bar and the dance floor.

Ladies special ticketting, Couple and Group ticketting at www.GenerationDesi.com or RSVP generationdesi@gmail.com. Due to the high expected turn out, people with prepaid tickets are guaranteed entry. RSVP guaranttees you an entry only if we havent capacity. Come celebrate with the rest of Boston!

Plenty of street parking and plenty free parking for our patrons in the parking lot across the street. Easiest location to park at and get too. Close to mass pike, route 90, ROUTE 95 and easy to get too.

Â
item.name: Simply Desi Halloween Party
